author: civanch
body:
#### PR description:
This is a pure technical PR which intend to fix compilation problem in #7436 due to wrong interface to INCLXX physics constructors of Geant4. Also two minor static analyzer warnings are  fixed. This PR should not affect any WF.

#### PR validation:
private

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:
no

title: Fixed INCLXX physics configurations
